title: More than one branches.
content: 347A. In the case where the overseas company has more than one branches within the Republic, the disclosure imposed by this Law as regards the information which is common for all branches, shall be complied with by the reference of each new branch to the information entered as to the first branch. In this case, the compulsory disclosure by the other branches shall be restricted to a mention of the register of the branch where the disclosure was made, as well as the entry number of the branch thereof in the said register. Obligatory indications in letters and order forms in respect of branches. 34 of 70(I) of 2003.
